text: Sorry I'm a little slow on the response but these are great resources, thank you! Is it bad if when writing my own code that it does similar functions to other codes I've seen or it even copies the end result of another's coding? Also do companies have their own way/setup of writing code or rig layout that they prefer their artists use, or is it up to the artist how it's layed out, within the outliner on Maya for example? If that makes sense:thinking_face::smile:.
